text: Only just saw this, but if it persists, don’t rule out your ISP messing about if it’s from a box at home. I used to work in ISPs and it was quite normal to “sin bin” customers (throttling, increasing latency, and so on) using more bandwidth than seemed reasonable based on contention needs. Normally triggered if they were torrenting, but could be an issue if you’re streaming a lot of market updates…
